publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology "

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Job 18
ab.l: Da qaruv b́erdi Bildad ol Šuḥili da ajtty.
Ńegińč́a qojɣejsyz učlar śoźĺarǵa anlajyz da andan sortun śoźĺajik.
Ńe üč́uń saɣyšlandyḥ tuvar kibik t́eli bolduḥ ḱoźĺarijiźǵe.
Jyrtuvču ǯanyn ačuvu byla śeniń üč́uńḿo kemišilir jer da ḱoč́ar qaja ornun- dan.
Daɣy čyraɣy rašaʿlarnyn śońar da balqymas jalyny otnun.
Jaryḥ qaranɣy bolur čatyrynda da čyraɣy anyn üśt́uńa śońar.
Tar bolurlar atlamlary ḱuč́uńuń da kemišir any keńaši.
Ki ilinir avɣa ajaḥlary byla da tuzaḥ üśt́uńa juŕur.
Tutar soɣančyɣyn tuzaḥ kipĺanir anyn üśt́uńa qaraḥčy.
Astralɣan bolur jerd́a bajlanmaɣy da elińč́agi iź üśt́uńa.

Č́uv́ŕa quršarlar
any alɣasamaḥlar da tozdururlar any ajaḥlaryna.
Ač bolurlar ulanlary da zaval t́uźuĺǵań bolur ulanlaryna.
Ašar buvunlaryn gufunun tavusur ulanlaryn tunɣuču öĺumńuń.
Üźuĺur čatyrdan išančy da ǯaḥt- lap eĺtir any bijǵa alɣasanmaḥlar.
Toḥtar čatyrynda t́uv́uĺ ö- źuńuń tozdururlar ornu üśt́uńa ḱuǵurt́.
Ašaɣartyn qoŕeńĺari qururlar da joɣartyn butaɣy qurur.
Saɣynčy taspolur jerd́ań da bolmast šem anar juźu üśt́uńa jerniń.
Tab́erirĺar any jaryḥtan qaranɣyɣa da dunjadan b́uŕaĺtirĺar any.
Bolmast anar uvlu uvlunun da üč́uńč́u dor uvlunda ulusunda da bolmast qaldyḥ tiriĺmiš- ĺarińd́a.
Ḱońu üśt́uńa tamaša et́arĺar sondraɣylar da burunɣu- lar tutarlar čačlaryn.
T́ek bulej bolurlar toḥtar jerĺari avančynyn da budur ornu kim ki biĺḿejdir T́eńrini.
